meanings.definition: A person who provides instruction or education.
meanings.sent1: The educators at the school helped the students learn new things.
meanings.sent2: Many educators dedicate their lives to helping others learn.
meanings.sent3: The educators decided to have a silly hat day to make learning more fun.
meanings.sent4: In the world of knowledge, educators are the guiding stars for students.
meanings.sent5: The educators' passion for teaching shines brightly in their classrooms.

meanings.definition: Those who work in the field of teaching or education.
meanings.sent1: Educators play a crucial role in shaping the future through education.
meanings.sent2: The educators in this district are known for their dedication and hard work.
meanings.sent3: During the staff meeting, the educators shared funny stories from their classrooms.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of knowledge, educators are the diligent gardeners nurturing young minds.
meanings.sent5: The educators' impact on students' lives is immeasurable and profound.
